title: OpenBC Website
description: OpenBC is a volunteer-driven organization that brings together technologists, designers, data analysts, and community members to work on projects that address civic and social challenges in BC using technology and innovation. They host hackathons, workshops, and events where participants collaborate to create solutions for local issues.

title: Airbnb Regulation
description: Illegal Airbnb listings are contributing to housing shortage in BC. This project aims to flag Airbnb listings that violates BC short-term rental policy.
